1083090.name: SpaceEngine - Moon HD
1083090.description:
This Moon HD DLC (addon) contains high-resolution textures for the Moon. It improves the level of detail of the lunar surface compared to the default SpaceEngine installation.

Credits:
Made by Klud's.
LOLA Science Team at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center, Greenbelt, MD.
NASA/GSFC/Arizona State University provided data accessed via Lunaserv WMS

Source data:
Elevation map: LRO DEM 2015 release (sldem2015_128 and ldem_128).
Image resolution: 92160x46080.
Effective resolution: 0.118 km/pix.

Surface albedo map: Boyd/Robinson WAC Normalized Reflectance (643nm), colorized by maps in 643nm, 566nm, 415nm.
Image resolution: 109164x54582.
Effective resolution: 0.1 km/pix.
